Package sample.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
sample.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The End-user uses various methods within this class to interact with the Login GUI. This screen can also be translated to various languages.

    onLoginButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method sends a verification check to the database and initiates a handshake to connect the end-user to the database within the program after entering their username and password into their corresponding text fields.
